name: American Dragon Jake Long - Attack of the Dark Dragon [NDS]
description:
Jake Long's beloved Rose is being held hostage by the nefarious Dark
Dragon, who plans to lure Jake to his destruction. The evil Huntsman,
meanwhile, is also after Dark Dragon's captive. Your mission: Turn back
an onslaught of villains attacking from every direction - jumping from
windows, bursting from trash cans and striking suddenly from even more
unlikely hiding places - and rescue Rose.

Features

• Transform Jake into the American Dragon and spew scorcing fire!
•
Take flight in full 3D Dragon stages!
• Unique combat system allows
you to release fire balls, perform jump attacks, and swipe your Dragon
tail!
